alert.note: Alert for Cheatham; Davidson; Dickson; Hickman; Humphreys; Williamson; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 9:36AM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Davidson, Dickson, southern Sumner, northern Williamson, northwestern Wilson, Cheatham, central Humphreys and northern Hickman Counties through 1015 AM CST... At 936 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ridgetop to 6 miles west of Dickson. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Franklin, Gallatin, Lebanon, Dickson, Ashland City, Nashville, Madison, Hendersonville, Brentwood, La Vergne, Mount Juliet, Goodlettsville, Millersville, Nolensville, Forest Hills, Oak Hill, White Bluff, Belle Meade, Kingston Springs and Lakewood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CST for Middle Tennessee.

area.areaDesc: Cheatham; Davidson; Dickson; Hickman; Humphreys; Williamson; Wilson
